urls.title: What are the size and weight limits for bags? · Spirit Airlines Support
urls.description: To keep ticket prices low for everyone, we charge for carry-ons and checked bags. We charge more for checked bags over 40 lbs. This is because the added weight requires more gas for the plane. One personal item that fits entirely in the smaller sizer box (like a purse, small backpack, etc.) is included with your ticket. Another personal item or anything larger like a standard carry-on or checked bag will need to be paid for. **For Military Bag policies please click here. Personal item: (e.g., purse, small

urls.title: What are the size and weight limits for bags? · Spirit Airlines Support
urls.description: To keep ticket prices low for everyone, we charge for carry-ons and checked bags. We charge more for checked bags over 40 lbs. This is because the added weight requires more gas for the plane. One personal item that fits entirely in the smaller sizer box (like a purse, small backpack, etc.) is included with your ticket. Another personal item or anything larger like a standard carry-on or checked bag will need to be paid for. **For Military Bag policies please click here. Personal item: (e.g., purse, small

@hoarhound We’re sorry this happened to you. Bags can be delayed longer than usual depending on airport operations or security. If you need any help at the airport, we have agents in our Baggage Service Office available.

If you have any additional questions feel free to DM us.
